FOUND IN: Bap (especially in British cuisine where this is a soft, round bread roll that can be larger than standard sizes)
Purple (historically associated with royalty due to its rarity in dyeing processes)
Herd (if referring to animals other than birds)
Moths are often seen around lights at dusk or after dark and they play a significant role in pollination of various flowers that bloom at night.
Porcelain (when not specifically referring to a type of fine china)
